search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Shift4Shop (shift4shop.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Shift4Shop is: [https://www.shift4shop.com/ecommerce-hosting-pricing.html](https://www.shift4shop.com/ecommerce-hosting-pricing.html)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Ecommerce hosting plans for your online store | Shift4Shop

extracted_content.content:
The Perfect Fit for Every Shop
------------------------------

Choose the right plan for your business

*   2 Staff Users
*   No additional transaction fees
*   Unlimited Products

*   5 Staff Users
*   No additional transaction fees
*   Unlimited Products

*   15 Staff Users
*   No additional transaction fees
*   Unlimited Products

*   Unlimited Staff Users
*   All the Features
*   No Limits
*   Powered by Shift4Shop

[](https://launch.shift4shop.com/onboarding)\*US Merchants Only

The free End-to-End eCommerce plan is only available to United States merchants at this time. If you are not located within the United States, you will not be able to sign up for the free plan. Instead, you can choose to sign up for one of the above paid plans — Basic Store, Plus Store, or Pro Store.

All Plans Include the Following Features
----------------------------------------

*   No additional transaction fees
*   24x7 Tech Support
*   Built-in Blog
*   Domain Registration
*   [Facebook Store](https://www.shift4shop.com/sell-on-facebook.html)
*   Unlimited Bandwidth
*   Shopping Cart
*   Secure Web Hosting
*   [100+ Payment Providers](https://www.shift4shop.com/ecommerce-payment-gateways.html)
*   Unlimited Orders
*   [50+ Mobile-Ready Themes](https://themes.shift4shop.com/free-ecommerce-themes.html)
*   [API Access](https://developer.3dcart.com/)

Thousands of Businesses Trust Shift4Shop to Sell Online
-------------------------------------------------------

In the end, Shift4Shop’s advanced API won the day. It gave us the flexibility we needed to build a completely integrated technology backbone for the company.

![Image 1: American RV Company](https://www.shift4shop.com/2015/images/support/AmericanRVCompany.com.png)

**John Nelson**

AmericanRVCompany.com

Shift4Shop was the perfect platform to continually learn more about running an online store. We wouldn’t be where we are today without it.

![Image 2: Jim Bergmann](https://www.shift4shop.com/2015/images/support/TruTechTools.com.png)

**Jim Bergmann**

TruTechTools.com

Powerful eCommerce Integrations to Grow Your Business
-----------------------------------------------------

![Image 3: facebook](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/facebook.png)

![Image 4: ebay](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/ebay.png)

![Image 5: amazon](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/amazon.png)

![Image 6: fedex](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/fedex.png)

![Image 7: avalara](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/avalara.png)

![Image 8: kount](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/kount.png)

Looking for an Enterprise eCommerce Platform?
---------------------------------------------

Our Shift4Shop Enterprise solution offers a custom ecommerce platform for high volume online stores.

Plus Great Bonuses for your Business
------------------------------------

![Image 9: yourdomain](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/your-domain.png)

Free Domain for 1 Year

![Image 10: avalara](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/avalara.png)

Avalara Sales Tax Free for 60 Days

![Image 11: snapchat](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/snapchat.png)

Snapchat $150 Ads Credit

![Image 12: fedex](https://www.shift4shop.com/2021/images/homepage/fedex.png)

Save up to on FedEx shipping

### Frequently Asked Questions

Have questions about our plans?

Are there any setup fees or transaction fees?

No, you only pay the monthly price, no additional fees.

Can I customize my plan by adding a feature I need or more users?

Yes, we can customize any of our plans to fit your needs. Contact our sales team at sales@Shift4Shop.com to find out how we can add a specific feature to any plan or add extra staff users.

Can I switch my store from another platform?

Yes, we'll be glad to help you switching over to continue growing your business. We have **special incentives** for switching and can assist with the products and design migration. [Schedule a call with a migration specialist](https://grow.3dcart.com/how-to-switch-ecommerce-platforms).

What integrations, payments and apps are supported?

Shift4Shop is set up automatically to take credit cards via Shift4. Alternate payment methods like PayPal are also available. For marketing and other tools, we have built-in integrations with MailChimp, AWeber, Google, Facebook, Houzz, and more. For a full list of integrations visit our App Store.

Can I cancel my account at any time?

Yes. you can easily cancel your account from your control panel if you decide Shift4Shop is not the best solution for your business. We do not offer refunds on our service.

Can I change my plan after I sign up?

Of course you can! Shift4Shop's amazing ecommerce solution is designed to grow as your business grows. So if you want to switch your current package at any time, give us a call and we’ll make it happen.

Do you offer any discounts on plans?

Can I use my own domain name?

Absolutely! We offer [FREE Domain name registration](https://www.shift4shop.com/free-domain-name.html) with all of our ecommerce plans. If you already have a domain or want to use a subdomain, our support team can help point your existing domain to your new Shift4Shop store.

Will my store be PCI Compliant, safe and secure?

Your store's data is completely safe. Shift4Shop is a fully-hosted, VISA PCI Certified ecommerce solution with a 99.99% uptime guarantee. More hosting information is available here: [https://www.Shift4Shop.com/ecommerce-hosting.html](https://www.shift4shop.com/ecommerce-hosting.html), so not even a natural disaster can compromise you business.

Do I need a separated web host or website ?

You can use your Shift4Shop online store with any existing website, but if you don't have one, then you can run your entire website, online store, blog and more directly from Shift4Shop.

How does my Shift4Shop plan grow with my business?

If you're on our free End-to-End eCommerce plan, no upgrades are needed, as the infrastructure and resources on this plan automatically accomodate increases in traffic. If you are using one of our paid plans, you will be automatically upgraded to the next plan once your trailing twelve-month sales volume reaches the maximum online sales supported by your plan.

Can I upgrade from the PRO Plan to Shift4Shop Enterprise?

Once your trailing twelve month sales volume exceeds $1,000,000, you qualify to upgrade to our Enterprise solution. This is calculated by adding up the sales volume you've processed over the last twelve months in USD; or if you have not yet been with Shift4Shop for twelve months, your sales volume processed over your existing time with Shift4Shop prorated to 12 months. This gives you the infrastructure needed to keep growing your business.

Unlimited ecommerce plans for $19.99/month, No additional transaction fees, unlimited products, orders, bandwidth and storage. Sign up and start selling online
